price: Waanin ani isiniin jedhu kana yaadachuuf jirtu. Ani dhimma kiyya gara Rabbiittin hirkifadha. Rabbiin gabroota Isaa argaadha.”
arabic: فَسَتَذۡكُرُونَ مَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمۡۚ وَأُفَوِّضُ أَمۡرِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَصِيرُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fasatadhkurūna mā aqūlu lakum wa-ufawwiḍu amrī ilā al-lahi inna al-laha baṣīrun bil-ʿibādi
